intro_st: 05 Hung Vuong st., Loc Tho Ward, Nha Trang City, Viet Nam
intro_line1: Located right in the center of Nha Trang city and only 5 minutes walk to the beach, Galina Hotel Mud Bath & Spa is the new and truly perfect choice for travelers coming to the beautiful seaside city.
intro_line2: In addition, at GALINA PREMIUM HOTEL we also have the natural hot mud bath and beauty center in Nha Trang city, with the best facilities and modern facilities.
